EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-03-09
EmailTemplate.subject: Our $270M Milestone and Citi's Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
March 9, 2017 <[[http://fortune.com/2017/03/07/pivotal-cloud-foundry-growth/]]> Big Year For Pivotal Cloud Foundry CEO Rob Mee spoke to Fortune's Barb Darrow about Pivotal Cloud Foundry's big year. Read the Article <[[http://fortune.com/2017/03/07/pivotal-cloud-foundry-growth/]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/imapivot/citi]]> Accelerating Transformation at Citi See how Citi helps developers unleash their own potential of building software the way in which they've always dreamed. Check It Out <[[https://pivotal.io/imapivot/citi]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-google-cre-together-driving-customer-anxiety-towards-zero]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry & Google CRE: Together Driving Customer Anxiety Towards Zero Pivotal and Google Cloud's CRE program will accelerate your journey towards operational excellence, without the anxiety and extra effort. Find Out How <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-google-cre-together-driving-customer-anxiety-towards-zero]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/imapivot-a-community-for-the-world-s-leading-software-experts]]> #ImAPivot: A Community for the World’s Leading Software Experts Join a community of leading technologists, hear incredible stories of transformation, and find your next great team. Are You a Pivot? <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/imapivot-a-community-for-the-world-s-leading-software-experts]]> <[[https://twitter.com/pivotal/status/839384222745821185]]> Pivotal Is Google's Cloud Technology Partner of the Year We're honored to have been named Global Technology Partner of the Year by Google this week at AT&T Park. Check It Out <[[https://twitter.com/pivotal/status/839384222745821185]]> <[[https://youtu.be/AJbId8mCQAw]]> Celebrating the Women of Pivotal Women represent an essential part the Pivotal community. Check out this video we made. Today, and Every Day <[[https://youtu.be/AJbId8mCQAw]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-cloud-native-label-matters-heres-why]]> The "Cloud-Native" Label Matters A cloud-native approach means a new way of looking at apps, data, ops, integration, security, and culture. It's worth it.
